verbose_text: The transcription factor Snail binds with E-box in the promoter region of E-cadherin, thus downregulating E-cadherin and promoting cell shedding and migration; thus, it is closely related to the in situ invasion and remote metastasis of tumor cells.
evidence: Snail binds with E-box in the promoter region of E-cadherin, thus downregulating E-cadherin
